channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Poo bin needed, 1st October
item.description:
The only two dog po bins from Pirton corner through yewtree way oakhurst close has a poo bin by oakhurst park and a poo bin yewtree way garages so u need to carry all the way round a dog walk if there were a bin on Pirton lane opposite Morley avanue then the bustop bin wouldn't get full of poo and a bin in aria marked hawthorn drive and maybe on green on Entrance to oakhurst close there wouldn't be so many overflowing and people leving the mess from a dog walker prospective
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakhurst Close, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previously reported large pothole which has had a temporary repair but needs better repair to avoid road breaking up further, 1st October
item.description:
The damage is adjacent to the driveway of the property named Tanglewood. I reported this previously and a temporary repair was done to remove danger of deep hole, however it clearly needs a better more permanent repair with damaged surface cutting out, resurfacing area and sealing edges to avoid it breaking up again. I have reported the road gulley being blocked on a separate report. If the drain was operational, the road surface would be less likely to deteriorate from ponding water.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previously reported pothole and blocked road gulley, 1st October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury
